document_data.name: Nightstar Guiding and Outfitters
document_data.mainbody: '''Nightstar Guiding and Outfitters''' was a general shop found in [[Waymoot]], [[Cormyr]], that catered to travelers and foresters.
document_data.Activities: In addition to supplying quality trail gear such as [[rope]]s, [[map]]s, [[boot]]s, and other goods, the store was a popular hangout for travelers and [[adventurer]]s who enjoyed each other's company and swapped tales over [[brandy]] or hot [[tea]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The store was owned and operated by [[Liriel Nightstar]], who was also rumored to be a member of the [[Harpers]].
